publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7611 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Committee Remit—That the Parliament agrees that the remit of the Transport, Infrastructure and Climate Change Committee be amended to— To consider and report on (a) matters relating to transport and infrastructure falling within the remit of the Cabinet Secretary for Finance and Sustainable Growth and (b) matters relating to climate change falling within the remit of the Cabinet Secretary for Rural Affairs and the Environment.
